REASON: First dose, 50 mg., I thought my heart was going to fly out of my chest.  The fast and pounding heartbeat was insane.  I also had a hard time catching my breath.  It was very scary.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR HYDRALAZINE HCL: After all the side effects, it didn't lower my BP at all.
While it brought my BP down somewhat, I begged doctor to take me off this med due to severe headache.7
